verses.verse: Forasmuch then <S%G3767>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3695>arm<s%> <S%G5210>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1771>mind;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he who has <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> has <S%G3973>ceased<s%> from <S%G266>sin;<s%>

<S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G980>you<s%> no <S%G3371>longer<s%> should <S%G980>live<s%> the <S%G1954>rest<s%> <S%G5550>of<s%> your <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> for the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> for the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we have <S%G979>spent<s%> <S%G713>enough<s%> of <S%G2254>our<s%> <S%G3928>past<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G2716>doing<s%> the <S%G2307>desire<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and having <S%G4198>walked<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G766>lewdness,<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%> drunken <S%G3632>binges,<s%> <S%G2970>orgies,<s%> <S%G4224>carousings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G111>abominable<s%> <S%G1495>idolatries.<s%>

<S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> They think it is <S%G3579>strange<s%> that <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G4936>run<s%> <S%G1519>with<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G401>excess<s%> of <S%G810>riot,<s%> <S%G987>blaspheming:<s%>
<S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> to him who <S%G2192>is<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> this <S%G5124>end<s%> the Good News was <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might be <S%G2919>judged<s%> indeed <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> as <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%> is <S%G1448>near.<s%> <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> be of sound <S%G4993>mind,<s%> <S%G3525>self-controlled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4993>sober<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G4335>prayer.<s%>

<S%G2531>As<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> has <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G5486>gift,<s%> <S%G1247>employ<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> in serving <S%G1519>one<s%> <S%G1438>another,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3623>managers<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in its various <S%G4164>forms.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2980>speaks,<s%> let it be <S%G5613>as<s%> it were the very <S%G3051>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1247>serves,<s%> let it be <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2479>strength<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5524>supplies,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>belong<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G3579>be<s%> <S%G3579>astonished<s%> <S%G5213>at<s%> the fiery <S%G4451>trial<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> has come upon <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3986>test<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> as though a strange <S%G3581>thing<s%> <S%G4819>happened<s%> to <S%G5213>you.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2526>because<s%> you are <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s <S%G3804>sufferings,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> with exceeding <S%G21>joy.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> you are <S%G3679>insulted<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> you are <S%G3107>blessed;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G373>rests<s%> <S%G2596>on<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G2596>On<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2596>part<s%> he is <S%G987>blasphemed,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2596>on<s%> <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G2596>part<s%> he is <S%G1392>glorified.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3958>let<s%> <S%G3361>none<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G5406>murderer,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G2812>thief,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an evil <S%G2555>doer,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5613><s%> a meddler in other <S%G244>men<s%>'s matters.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> one of you <S%G5613>suffers<s%> for being a <S%G5546>Christian,<s%> let <S%G153>him<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G153>ashamed;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> let him <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>matter.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> has come for <S%G2917>judgment<s%> to <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G575>with<s%> the <S%G3624>household<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> it begins <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G575>with<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> will <S%G5056>happen<s%> to those who <S%G544>don't<s%> obey the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> it is <S%G3433>hard<s%> for the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> to be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> <S%G4226>what<s%> <S%G5316>will<s%> <S%G5316>happen<s%> to the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G268>sinner?<s%>"

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> let them also who <S%G3958>suffer<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G16>doing<s%> good <S%G3908>entrust<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> to <S%G5613>him,<s%> as to a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2939>Creator.<s%>
